EXAMPLE TEXT, SHOULD BE IN ENGLISH
These markers represent each of the visitable areas of the Pintia site. Clicking on them takes you to each of the sections.
By pressing this button, the legend is displayed, allowing you to access the same visitable points of the site.
Once you see the message that your location has been loaded, pressing this button lets you access your real-time location.
By pressing this button, the map\'s focus is recentered on the site in case you have moved around the map.
By pressing this button, you can open Maps and find the route to reach the site.
As an extra feature, the application allows you to take a photo and display the location where it was taken on the map, as well as view these photos in the Gallery section.
By clicking on this button, you can scan the QR codes located throughout the cemetery on some of the information boards.
By clicking on the button, the audio guide will start playing, and you can pause and resume it whenever you want.
